3. Tap the "+" button.

4. Input data in the format DD.MM.YYYY in the "Title" field.

5. Input Latin symbols, Spaces, Special characters and Emoji in the task description field.

6. Tap the checkmark button.

   **Expected result:** The saving is available.

Summary: Shopping cart (Submodule Wrapper): Information about the currency of payment is not available in the "Cart Totals" section after displaying the Total price
Environment: Windows 11 Home Version 22H2 (64-bit operating system), Google Chrome Version 108.0.5359.99
Description:
**STR:**

1. Open the <https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/>

2. Select the product: Categories-\>Books-\> The book "Computing and Internet"

3. Click The "Add to cart" button

4. Click the "Shopping cart" header link

5. Navigate to the "Cart Totals" section

   **Result:** Information about the currency of payment is not available in the "Cart Totals" section.

   **Expected result:** Information about the currency of payment is available in the "Cart Totals" section

Summary: Shopping cart (Submodule Wrapper): The shipping price is not displayed after inputting valid information in the "Estimate shipping" section
Environment: Windows 11 Home Version 22H2 (64-bit operating system), Google Chrome Version 108.0.5359.99
Description:
**STR:**

1. Open the <https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/>

2. Select the product: Categories-\>Books-\> The book "Computing and Internet"

3. Click the "Add to cart" button

4. Click the "Shopping cart" header link

5. Navigate to the "Estimate shipping" section

6. Input a valid destination (Country: "Poland", Zip "01-493")

7. Click the "Estimate shipping" button

   **Result:** The shipping price is not displayed after inputting valid information in the "Estimate shipping" section.

   **Expected result:** The shipping price is displayed after inputting valid information in the "Estimate shipping" section.

Summary: Checkout (Submodule 5 Payment Information): The "Wrong Card code" error message is not displayed after inputting an invalid Card code in the "Payment Information" section
Environment: Windows 11 Home Version 22H2 (64-bit operating system), Google Chrome Version 108.0.5359.99
Description:
**STR:**

1. Select credit card type "AMEX" in the "Payment Information" section (checkout step 5) in the "Select credit card" dropdown.
2. Input the Cardholder name "TEST" in the "Cardholder name" field
3. Input the Card number "375700000000002" in the "Card number" field
4. Input the Expiration date "12/2025" in the "Expiration date" combo-box
5. Input the invalid code "1235" in the "Card code" field
6. Click the "Continue" button

**Result:** The "Wrong Card code" error message is not displayed after inputting an invalid card code in the "Payment Information" section

**Expected result:** The "Wrong Card code" error message is displayed after inputting an invalid card code in the "Payment Information" section

Summary: Checkout (Submodule 5 Payment Information): The "Card Expired" error message is not displayed after inputting an expired credit card in the "Payment Information" section
Environment: Windows 11 Home Version 22H2 (64-bit operating system), Google Chrome Version 108.0.5359.99
Description:
**STR:**

1. Select the radiobutton "Credit card" in the "Payment Method" section (checkout step 4).

2. Click the "Continue" button

3. Input in the "Expiration date" combo-box an expired date

   **Result:** The "Card Expired" error message is not displayed after inputting an expired credit card in the "Payment Information" section

   **Expected result:** The "Card Expired" error message is displayed after inputting an expired credit card in the "Payment Information" section

Environment: Windows 11 Home Version 22H2 (64-bit operating system), Google Chrome Version 108.0.5359.99

1. Select the Billing address on the page <https://demowebshop.tricentis.com/onepagecheckout>

2. Input Numbers in the "First Name" field

3. Fill in the other required fields with valid values

4. Click the "Continue" button

Summary: Checkout (Submodule 5 Payment Information): The "Payment is blocked due to suspected fraud" message is not displayed after inputting Pick up. Stolen card

Description:

3. Input the Card number "5538300838605560" in the "Card number" field
4.  Input the Expiration date "12/2025" in the "Expiration date" combo-box
5. Input the Card code "123" in the "Card code" field
6. Click the "Continue" button

**Result:** The "Payment is blocked due to suspected fraud" message is not displayed after inputting Pick up. Stolen card

**Expected result:** The "Payment is blocked due to suspected fraud" message is  displayed after inputting Pick up. Stolen card
